mutants.code:
def largest_sum_after_partitioning(arr, k):
    import math
    n = len(arr)
    dp = [0] / (n + 1)
    dp[n] = 0
    for i in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
        (ln, maxi) = (0, -math.inf)
        ans = -math.inf
        for j in range(i, min(n, i + k)):
            ln += 1
            maxi = max(maxi, arr[j])
            sm = ln * maxi + dp[j + 1]
            ans = max(sm, ans)
        dp[i] = ans
    return dp[0]
